author: Redjumpman (Redjumpman#1337) modified by locastan
install_msg:
Thank you for installing the den. Be sure to check out the wiki here: https://github.com/Redjumpman/Jumper-Plugins/wiki/Casino-RedV3
This cog may put a heavy load on your bot if used with 10k users or more. It is highly recommended that you use MongoDB with large user bases.
name: The Den
description: Play up to 7 unique games and earn currency.
